moves.2. e5 Nd5 3. d4 d6 4. exd6 cxd6 5. Bc4: I think whites best move was c4 not Bc4.
moves.5... Nb6 6. Bb3 g6 7. Nf3 Bg7 8. O-O O-O: OK, now is when stuff starts happening.
moves.11. Nxe5 Bxe5 12. c4: I don't know why he'd make his bishop even worse.
moves.12... Bf5: My 2 bishops are fantastic as always.
moves.13. Nd2 a5: Trying to put pressure on c4.
moves.14. Bc2: Bad bishop for a bad bishop, sounds fine to me.
moves.18. Bb2 Bxb2 19. Qxb2 Ne5: Went to e5 instead threatening d3 fork.
moves.26. f4 Ng4 27. f5 Ne3: I can't believe that I missed Qc5+ which wins with a smothered mate! Monkey see monkey do.
moves.30. a3: That doesn't work my find friend, because...
moves.34. gxf5 Qxf3+ 35. Qxf3 Rxf3 36. fxg6 hx: I think I can win this.
That was mistake on his part that I missed, gxh4+ Kxh4 and Rxc4+ wins.
Now it's honestly quite over, you can finish looking at the game if you want.
moves.76. Ke4 Qxa4+: I probably could have mated him in a move or 2 but I head a minute and a half on the clock so I just took the rook.
